short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clear your cache and browsing data with a single click of a button.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Forget rapidly the browsing data with this extension

You can customize what and how much of your data you want to clear on the options page, including: 

- Cache
- Cookies
- Downloads
- Form Data
- History
- Indexed DB
- Local Storage (Since version 0.5.9 removed)
- Plugin Data
- Passwords
- Service Workers
==================
Release 1.0.4 - Removed unnecessary permission
==================
Important notation: Forget It extension does not collect or send any data
